channel.title: Posts on Cleary's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cleary's blog

item.title: Bar Plot
item.description: hello this is a bar plot. youre welcome. library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) query<-"SELECT name,HR FROM Teams WHERE yearID=1980 ORDER BY HR" result<-sqldf(query) result$name<-factor(result$name,levels=result$name) ggplot()+ geom_bar(data=result,aes(x=name,y=HR),stat='identity',color="white",fill="blue")+ coord_flip()+ ylab("Homeruns")+ xlab("Teams")+ ggtitle("1980 Team Homerun Distribution")

item.title: Time Series
item.description: hello people this is the time series example. library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) # Extraction---------------------------- query<-"SELECT yearID,HR FROM Batting WHERE playerID='ruthba01'" result<-sqldf(query) # Visualization------------------------- ggplot()+ #geom_point(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ geom_line(data=result,aes(x=yearID,y=HR))+ ggtitle("Ruth's Homerun Totals Throughout the Years")+ xlab("Year")+ ylab("Homeruns")

item.title: Histograms
item.description: Histograms library(sqldf) library(Lahman) library(ggplot2) # extracting data---------------- query<-"SELECT weight FROM Master" result<-sqldf(query) # visualizing data------------- ggplot()+ geom_histogram(data=result,aes(x=weight),color="green",fill="white",bins="50")+ ggtitle("Body Weigh Distribution for Baseball Players") ## Warning: Removed 854 rows containing non-finite values (stat_bin).

item.title: Scatter Plots
item.description: Scatter Plots library(sqldf) library(Lahman) library(ggplot2) # extracting data ---------------- query<-"SELECT playerID,sum(HR) AS career_HR,sum(SO) AS career_SO FROM Batting GROUP BY playerID HAVING sum(HR)>=400" result<-sqldf(query) #visualizing the data -------------- ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=career_SO,y=career_HR),size=3,color="blue")+ ggtitle("Career Strikeouts vs Homeruns for Great Hitters")+ xlab("career strikeouts")+ ylab("career homeruns")
